explanation: To think creatively, not limited by traditional thinking patterns.
To start something, especially something important or complex.
To briefly make contact with someone to update or confirm details.
Having a mutual understanding or agreement.
To contribute something of value to a project or discussion.
To start over because the current idea or product failed.
To start something with great enthusiasm and energy.
Tasks or goals that are easily achievable and don't require much effort.
The fundamental and most important factor.
To go beyond the usual or expected limits.
To think and respond quickly in an unpredictable situation.
To do more than what is required or expected.
A newly introduced element or factor that changes an existing situation significantly.
A decision or a choice that is very easy to make because the right option is obvious.
A method or technique that has consistently shown results superior to those achieved by other means.
To be well-informed about the state of affairs or up-to-date on a situation.
To do things according to the rules or the policy.
A broad perspective on an issue or problem, looking at the big picture.
Information not to be made publicly available or formally recorded.
The capability of a system or process to handle a growing amount of work, or its potential to be enlarged.
Agreement on a course of action or the acceptance of a plan.
To complete a process or project, especially one that has been open for some time.
To use something to maximum advantage.
Outside of the current area of focus or concern.
An in-depth exploration or analysis of a topic or issue.
To familiarize someone with a new task or to acclimate them to new conditions.
A problem that a customer or a company needs to solve.
A fundamental change in the approach or underlying assumptions.
When the combined effect of a group is greater than the sum of the individual efforts.
To discuss something privately or in a different setting, e.g., not during a current meeting.
Fully informed or current on an issue or a subject.
A mutually beneficial outcome or situation.
The capacity to handle work; the ability to undertake additional activities.
In the process of being planned, developed or produced.
A standard or point of reference against which things can be compared or assessed.
The very forefront of technological development, even beyond the cutting edge.
To return to a topic or issue later for further consideration or discussion.
A defining capability or advantage that distinguishes an enterprise from its competitors.
An innovation that significantly alters the way that businesses operate, creating a new market and value network.
A complex network or interconnected system, often used when referring to businesses and their interaction with other entities.
To make a significant change in strategy or product direction.
An innovation, service, or feature intended to make a company or product attractive to customers.
To cause a noticeable change in a situation; to make a significant difference.
To improve the efficiency of a process by simplifying or eliminating unnecessary steps.
To increase or cause to increase in speed, efficiency, or intensity.
To undertake an impossible project or to make a task unnecessarily difficult.
Working in a manner that is isolated from other parts of an organization or system, often leading to inefficiency.
A product or service that is ready for immediate use, especially software or an appliance.
Software or hardware that is easy for novices to use, without requiring expert knowledge.
The leading position in a field, especially in technology, implying advanced and innovative features.
Paying close attention to detail; very detailed or precise.
To repeat a process or sequence of actions, often with the aim of approaching a desired goal or target.
